title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
**Product Listing: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte**

**Product Description:**

Achieve a flawless eye look with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte. This versatile eyeshadow stick is available in 3 finishes - Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic - and 30 different shades to choose from. With its unique crème-to-powder formula, this eyeshadow stick provides a smooth, creamy application that sets to a long-lasting powder finish.

**Key Features:**

- **Highly Pigmented**: Get rich, vibrant color with every application.
- **Waterproof and Crease-Proof**: Enjoy all-day wear without worrying about smudging or fading.
- **Suitable for Sensitive Skin**: Our eyeshadow stick is gentle on sensitive skin and provides nourishing benefits.
- **Antioxidant-Rich Ingredients**: Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax work together to protect and hydrate your skin.
- **Improves Skin Tone and Texture**: Enhance your natural skin tone and texture with our innovative formula.

**Application Made Easy:**

- **No Brush Required**: Simply sweep the stick directly onto your eyelid for a quick and easy application.
- **Built-in Smudger**: Use the included smudger to blend and soften your look.
- **Blend Before Setting**: Blend your eyeshadow before the formula sets for a seamless finish.

**Product Details:**

- **Product Name:** Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
- **Shade Options:** 30 different shades available in Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic finishes
- **Formulation:** Crème-to-Powder
- **Ingredients:** Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Candelilla Wax
- **Skin Benefits:** Hydration, Nourishment, Antioxidant Protection, Environmental Damage Repair, Skin Tone Improvement, Texture Improvement

**Order Now and Experience the Julep Difference:**

Get ready to elevate your eye makeup game with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte. Order now and discover a world of long-lasting, high-pigmentation color that's gentle on your skin.
